plot: Shakespeare's classic tale retold in Dr. Seuss-style rhyme. Prince Hamlet seeks to avenge his father's murder, while his loyal servant SamIamlet tries to get him to sample a new food dish.
title: Green Eggs and Hamlet
plot_es: Shakespeare's classic tale retold in Dr. Seuss-style rhyme. Prince Hamlet seeks to avenge his father's murder, while his loyal servant SamIamlet tries to get him to sample a new food dish.
plot_en: Shakespeare's classic tale retold in Dr. Seuss-style rhyme. Prince Hamlet seeks to avenge his father's murder, while his loyal servant SamIamlet tries to get him to sample a new food dish.
